title: The new journalism
author: VD
content_html:
It is a truly noble profession:

CHRIS MATTHEWS: Yeah, well, you know what? I want to do everything I can to make this thing work, this new presidency work, and I think that —

JOE SCARBOROUGH: Is that your job? You just talked about being a journalist!

MATTHEWS: Yeah, it is my job. My job is to help this country.

It’s been a long, long time, but at least they’re finally coming out in the open about their bias. Is there any doubt that Chris Matthews, and Keith Olbermann, and Katie Couric, and nearly every other TV and print journalist won’t do everything they can to make the Obama presidency work?
content_text:
It is
a truly noble profession
:
CHRIS MATTHEWS:  Yeah, well, you know what?  I want to do everything I can to make this thing work, this new presidency work, and I think that —
JOE SCARBOROUGH: Is that your job? You just talked about being a journalist!
MATTHEWS:  Yeah, it is my job. My job is to help this country.
It’s been a long, long time, but at least they’re finally coming out in the open about their bias.  Is there any doubt that Chris Matthews, and Keith Olbermann, and Katie Couric, and nearly every other TV and print journalist won’t do everything they can to make the Obama presidency work?
